title: Web developer | front-end
presentation: I am an experienced front-end developer specializing in designing and developing modern, high-performance user interfaces. Throughout my career, I've had the opportunity to collaborate with diverse teams on ambitious projects. I have a deep mastery of the React ecosystem and am a dedicated user of Tailwind CSS. By combining creativity and technical rigor, I am able to develop web applications that meet the needs of your users. Feel free to contact me to discuss your project.
